name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: StackOverflow: Accepted Answer Has Less Votes

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights the green check mark of accepted Stackoverflow/Stack Exchange answers that aren't the most upvoted answer to the question

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The accepted answer isn't always the best answer! This extension warns you when there might be a better one.
